title: Student-Customized Academic Achievement Prediction and Curriculum Management Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Learners design predictive models and conduct curriculum improvement projects using real university environmental data. Team-based collaboration is emphasized in digital environments (laptops/online platforms).

learning_goals: Learners can identify five or more key factors (e.g., demographics, socioeconomic elements) influencing student academic performance.
Learners can design a student achievement prediction process using a Python-based predictive model (utilizing Keras).
Based on analysis results, learners can propose three or more actionable strategies for curriculum improvement.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
